sen.j: 中御門 為行（なかみかど ためゆき、建治7年（1276年）－正慶元年9月10日 (旧暦)（1332年9月30日））は、鎌倉時代後期の公卿。
sen.e: Tameyuki NAKAMIKADO (1276 - September 30 (on September 10, according to the old calendar), 1332) was Kugyo (a court noble) during the late Kamakura period.
Tameyuki NAKAMIKADO (1276 - September 30, 1332) was a kugyo (a court noble) during the late Kamakura period.
sen.cmt: ルールに従い旧暦は削除しました。「公卿」の訳部分が大文字、不定冠詞なしの状態で特定の人物を表すかのようになっていましたので、小文字化と不定冠詞を追加し修正しました。
sen.e: Tameyuki NAKAMIKADO (1276 - September 30, 1332) was a kugyo (a court noble) during the late Kamakura period.

sen.j: 勧修寺流中御門為方の子。
sen.e: He was a child of Tamemasa NAKAMIKADO of the Kanjuji line.
He was a child of Tamemasa NAKAMIKADO of the Kanjuji line.
He was a child of Tamemasa NAKAMIKADO of the Kanjuji line.

sen.j: 正応4年（1291年）、16歳の若さで右少弁に任じられ、正安2年1月5日には従三位に叙せられる。
sen.e: In 1291, he was appointed to Ushoben (Minor Controller of the Right) at the age of as young as sixteen, and on January 5 (according to the old calendar), 1300, was bestowed Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
In 1291, he was appointed to Ushoben (Minor Controller of the Right) at the early age of sixteen, and he was bestowed Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) on January 28, 1300.
sen.cmt: 「〜の若さで」の部分をより一般的なものに修正しました。基本的に旧暦は調べ直すべきですので、旧暦であると説明を加えるのではなく日時を変更しました。
sen.e: In 1291, he was appointed to Ushoben (Minor Controller of the Right) at the early age of sixteen, and he was bestowed Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) on January 28, 1300.

sen.j: 3年後に参議に任じられ、徳治元年（1315年）に父より後宇多上皇の院執権を譲られるが、同年の父の没により参議を辞任。
sen.e: Although three years later, he was appointed to Sangi, Councilor, and in 1315, he was yielded Innoshikken (regent to the shogunate under the retired emperor) of the Retired Emperor Gouda, he was resigned Sangi at the death of his father in the same year.

Three years later, he was appointed to Sangi (Councilor) and later he was yielded Innoshikken status (regent to the shogunate under the retired emperor) of the Retired Emperor Gouda from his father in 1315; however, he resigned as Sangi upon the death of his father in the same year.
sen.cmt: 文頭にAlthoughを持ってきていますが、前項目から引き継いだ「3年後に〜」の部分には関わりがないため、この分節に含めるのは誤訳です。修正しました。参議の説明を括弧に収めました。「父より〜を譲られる」の意味が欠落していましたので追加しました。
sen.e: Three years later, he was appointed to Sangi (Councilor) and later he was yielded Innoshikken status (regent to the shogunate under the retired emperor) of the Retired Emperor Gouda from his father in 1315; however, he resigned as Sangi upon the death of his father in the same year.

sen.j: また、彼自身は持明院統に近く、延慶 (日本)元年（1308年）の伏見上皇院政復活と同時に参議に再任された。
sen.e: He himself kept the close relationship with Jimyoin-to (imperial linage from Emperor Gofukakusa to Emperor Gokomatsu), and in 1308, he was reappointed to Sangi currently with the revival of Insei (rule of the retired emperor) of the Retired Emperor Fushimi.

His background was close to the influence of Jimyoin-to (imperial linage from Emperor Gofukakusa to Emperor Gokomatsu), therefore he was reappointed to Sangi in 1308, upon the revival of Insei (rule of the retired emperor) by the Retired Emperor Fushimi.
sen.cmt: 「持明院統に近く、」の訳ですが、「he himself kept the close relationship with Jimyointo」としています。この場合、原文では「既存の状態」を示しているのみにもかかわらず「近い関係を保ち続けた」という「自発的な行為」を意味する内容に変更されています。事実実際そうであるのかもしれませんが、その説明はないですので、修正しました。
sen.e: His background was close to the influence of Jimyoin-to (imperial linage from Emperor Gofukakusa to Emperor Gokomatsu), therefore he was reappointed to Sangi in 1308, upon the revival of Insei (rule of the retired emperor) by the Retired Emperor Fushimi.

sen.j: 2年後、権中納言となったが同年に辞任している。
sen.e: Two years later, he became Gon Chunagon (a provisional vice-councilor of state), but resigned from it in the same year.
Two years later, he became Gon Chunagon (a provisional vice-councilor of state), but resigned from the position in the same year.
sen.cmt: itによる置換はあまり好ましくないためきちんと記述しました。
sen.e: Two years later, he became Gon Chunagon (a provisional vice-councilor of state), but resigned from the position in the same year.
